code: import{SET_SLIDE_MENU}from"../types";var setSlideMenuReducer=function setSlideMenuReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_SLIDE_MENU:return!state;default:return state;}};export default setSlideMenuReducer;
